CADI.Server.LogicalTarget.JPEG2000

Class JP2KLogicalTargetIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • CADI.Server.LogicalTarget.JPEG2000.JP2KLogicalTargetIndexer

  • public class JP2KLogicalTargetIndexer
extends java.lang.Object
    Indexes a logical target file, i.e, reads the logical target structure and it is kept in memory be used later when a client request for a Window of Interest of the logical target. How the logical target structure is kept in memory, it is more easy and faster to find the precincts which belong to the requested WOI.
    Version:
    1.0.4 2012/01/14
    Author:
    Group on Interactive Coding of Images (GICI)

    • Field Detail

      • target

        private java.lang.String target

      • in

        private BufferedDataInputStream in

      • log

        private CADILog log

      • logicalTarget

        private JP2KServerLogicalTarget logicalTarget
        Is the logical target which is being delivery. This object contains information about the target geometry, file input stream, ...

      • readCodingPasses

        private boolean readCodingPasses
        Indicates whether the coding passes structure must be read. Otherwise, codestream is only indexed at packet structure.

      • parentName

        private java.lang.String parentName
        It is the parent name (which invokes an object of this class).

        This attribute will be used to be passed to the log object as the thread name.

      • predictiveModelFileName

        private java.lang.String predictiveModelFileName
        Is the file name of a file which contains the predictive model values.

        Further information about predictive model, please see CADI.Server.LogicalTarget.ReadPredictiveModel class.

      • doTranscoding

        private boolean doTranscoding
